column2: The First Estate is the feudal form of government created by the Invictus.
The Iqta adapted for the undead.
The Testament of Longinius has theocratic practices for the government of vampires.
Various tribal vampiric blood cults, the Circle of the Crone being their largest confederation.
The rule of a domain by a council of elders called the Primogen.
Traditions of the Camarilla--chief among these is The Masquerade.
The Iqta adapted for the undead.
Werewolves who have pledged to Luna.
Werewolves who remain faithful to Father Wolf.
Undercity dwellers who rarely emerge to the surface.
The rule of a domain by a council of elders called the Primogen.
The Litany is the code of laws kept by the Garou. In its' full form, it is more of an epic poem than a legal code. Each tribe interprets the Litany differently, causing its' multiform shape.
The Code of Milan regulates the behavior of the Sabbat
Carthians experiment with a variety of modern Republican governments.
The government of mortal witch-hunters determined to destroy the supernatural.
The inverted Dharma of the vampires of India.
Not aligned with a particular covenant
Neither the Diamond Orders nor the Pyramid
